title: Transition from Concrete to Abstract
text: Invite recall of bead frame procedures; transition to notation by isolating the new difficulty. Control of error exists in place value alignment.
subject: Math

title: Observation and Normalization
text: Environment management is secondary to correct match between child, key lessons, and freedom within limits. Observe before intervening.
subject: Grace & Courtesy

title: Grace & Courtesy: Working Quietly
text: Present language of requesting quiet; model voice levels; establish community norms with the children present as co-authors.
subject: Grace & Courtesy

title: Checkerboard Multiplication Key Lesson
text: The checkerboard material offers a bridge from concrete multiplication to abstract notation. Emphasize place value and partial products.
subject: Math

title: Bank Game: Regrouping
text: In the bank game, regrouping is experienced physically through exchanging ten simple units for one of the next order. Use minimal language; allow the child to discover the pattern.
subject: Math
